Key Match Events: Danushka Gunathilaka was bowled by Rashid Khan for 33
Bhanuka Rajapaksa was bowled by Naveen-ul-Haq for 31
Dasun Shanaka was caught by Najibullah Zadran off Mujeeb Ur Rahman for 10
Charith Asalanka was bowled by Mohammad Nabi for 8
Post-Match Reflections: Rahmanullah Gurbaz was awarded the player of the match award
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka won the match by 4 wickets with 5 balls remaining
The match was played at Sharjah Cricket Stadium on September 03, 2022
Sri Lanka scored 179/6 in 19.1 overs, chasing a target of 176
Others: The match was part of the Men's T20 Asia Cup 2022
The match number was T20I no. 1757
